message.content:
Answer: Second

The second grid has a filled border (all cells around the edge are filled) and horizontal lines of filled cells in the middle rows (the third and fourth rows have filled cells in the second, third, and fourth columns). The first and third grids do not meet these criteria. The first grid has horizontal lines of filled cells in the middle rows, but it does not have a completely filled border.
